title: PvP Client keeps loosing connection
body:
Hello.

Starting off:
- Reinstalled League 3 times and Windows 2 times (no effect)
- Disabled "IP Helper" (no effect)
- Tried "Legacy Client" (no effect)
- Stable connection, tested with wifi and cable also (no effect)
- Havent been working proper since July 2016 where the beta client was introduced.
- Not having any ping loss or connection issues in games, real problem getting there though.

Running all blizzard games and a wide varity of steam games without having been disconnected "ever"(servers do break down).

I have officially run out of ideas, and im now hoping that someone can say that its a know problem and there is a easy fix.

Regards Mr. Paperclips

Edit: Having problems getting from client to game ( need to force game shutdown and reconnect for me to join a game )

replies.body:
I appreciate the detailed steps you've outlined with your situation, and I'd like to help!  Assuming you're getting a connection error, it sounds like something is blocking your network from reaching the game server after champion select.  Once you actually get in game, though, it sounds like everything is okay.  Even though your connection seems stable, you can have issues reaching specific servers like the game server.  

I'd first recommend grabbing our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) and run the firewall configuration to clear any possible blocks.  Then go over each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to rule out possibilities.  Test it in a custom game, and let me know how it goes!

The repair tool have done something, going through the connection guide has not helped anything whatsoever.

The connection instability in client seems to have vanished, however the passing from client to game still there, however that is manageable in comparrison to the not being able to set talents or swap champ.

Update: ....... I spoke too soon, the random client DC's are back G_G
a 5day grace period on getting an answer again :S
